content: Swoosh! But for now... right this way! The <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> Planet Registry is just up ahead.

content: <style=Highlight>Oumuamua</style>'s already flown off into the distance~! No worries, I'm sure you'll meet again soon. <style=SizeSmall>Wild! I wanna fly through the Starsea too...</style>
